Sciences-Urbana  Library Search  Library Search       470 Grainger Engineering Library Information Center, 1301 W. Springfield Ave.   Urbana,  IL  61801     Circulation and Reference: (217) 244-2261      Reference email: lib-lhsu@uic.edu     The Library of the Health Sciences-Urbana serves the UIC Colleges of Medicine and Nursing at Urbana. The medical collection is available to UIC medical students only and can be found at the Carle Forum in the Masley Resource Center. The nursing collection can be found on the second floor (west) at the Grainger Engineering Library Information Center.      Today's Hours  To be determined   Additional Hours   By Appointment only; online help is also available .
